comment:
Optimization problem:This problem involves maximizing the total caloric intake of seniors while meeting certain nutritional requirements and constraints.
Linear programming:This problem can be formulated as a linear programming problem where the objective is to maximize the total caloric intake subject to constraints on fibre and iron intake.
Constraint:In this context, constraints refer to the limitations imposed on the number of cups of spinach and soybeans based on the nutritional requirements and the condition that the number of cups of spinach must exceed the number of cups of soybeans.
